title: PTA-Pocalypse, Britney Was Right 8.13.21
itunes:title: PTA-Pocalypse, Britney Was Right 8.13.21
description:
In episode 969, Jack and Miles are joined by Toxic: The Britney Spears Story's Tess Barker & Babs Gray to discuss the Texas voter suppression bill, dipshits in Tennessee, Britney Spears update, and more!

FOOTNOTES:

  1. TDZ LIVE SHOW TICKETS!
  2. Texas passes their voter suppression bill, DOJ almost made the coup happen
  3. This Scene In TN … These Dipshits Are Getting Out Of Hand
  4. Britney Update
  5. Listen - Jono Das - “Hurricanrana”

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
